title: A Few Surprises But No Major Upsets (Yet) At U.S. Open
content:
Serena Williams plays her third-round match tonight at 7 p.m. Eastern, and is vowing to win her first Grand Slam by winning the tournament. 
 
There haven’t been any major upsets in the tournament so far, but there have been some surprises, including a number of heat-related injuries and a drone crash. 
 
Sports Illustrated executive editor  Jon Wertheim joins  Here & Now host Robin Young to talk about the tournament so far. 
 
 Guest   Jon Wertheim , executive editor at Sports Illustrated. He tweets @jon_wertheim .
